name: The Subtance of Things
description:
A relaxing experience that asks you to be patient with it. A moment of respite on your desktop.

The Substance of Things is an experimental art game. It is part living wallpaper collection, musical white noise and game of endurance. It is an encouragement to hold faith through trying, often ambiguous situations.

Pay close attention and it will reveal itself to you. Patience and diligence will give way to results.

"Now Faith is being sure of what we hope for; believing that which we cannot see.

FEATURES

- No Controls

- Hand-crafted Painterly Aesthetic

- Living Wallpapers

- Dynamic Musical White Noise

- Use as a Soundscape for Relaxation, Meditation and Yoga.

- Clues/ secrets

- Poetry
